attributes.action: Start talks for military action against zanu pf in zimbadwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as the violence and opression in zimbadwe continues. the british government seems to be doing little but talk about it and is reluctant to take any real steps.

I am normally a a pascifist, but with the casualties from mugabe's militia mounting action would save more lives than it would harm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
